nodes.text: The Rolling Droids were a mechanical band that created a genre of music called warbat, which played well to hangars full of appreciative astromech droids. Their opening act was Danny and the Droids and, by the year 4.3 ABY, the F series repair droid F-22-RGKx enjoyed listening to the group.

The Rolling Droids were first mentioned in Tokyo Disneyland's simulator ride theme park attraction Star Tours, which opened on July 12, 1989. The name of the band was a reference to the real-world music band The Rolling Stones.
